item.title: [PI] Adding a special attack that zeros the opponent's prayer rep++
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

Hey, I have added the Zaryte bow and want to add a special attack to it even though in real rs it doesn’t but i don’t really care.

This special attack when used will use 100% of special attack which is all sorted using this code case 1377: case 11696: case 11730: case 79: //my item if(c.specAmount >= 10) { c.specAmount -= 10; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(weapon); return true; } return false;
Anyone know how I could add this special attack? The attack gfx is the same for the magic long bow at the moment case 79: // Zaryte c.usingBow = true; c.bowSpecShot = 3; c.lastWeaponUsed = weapon; c.startAnimation(426); c.gfx100(250); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); c.projectileStage = 1; if (c.fightMode == 2) c.attackTimer--; break;

Thanks in advance!

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Adding a special attack that zeros the opponent's prayer rep++
